___institute_label.description: An abbreviation for the institute the lab is associated with.
___institute_label.title: Institute label

___title.description: A unique name for lab & affiliation use PI's first & last name, Lab, comma, and institute label. (e.g. John Doe Lab, UNI).
___title.title: Title

___contact_persons.description: Users designated as points of contact for this Lab.
___contact_persons.title: Lab Contacts

items.description: A User associated with the lab who is also a point of contact.
items.title: Lab Contact

___name.description: A short unique name for the lab, use lower cased and hyphen delimited PI name and lab(e.g. john-doe-lab).
___name.title: Name

items.description: A grant associated with the lab.
items.title: Grant

___phone2.description: The lab's alternative phone number (with country code).
___phone2.title: Alternate phone number

___phone1.description: The lab's primary phone number (with country code).
___phone1.title: Primary phone number

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the lab.
___url.title: Website URL

___institute_name.description: The name for the institute the lab is associated with.
___institute_name.title: Institute

___fax.description: A fax number for the lab (with country code).
___fax.title: Fax number
